about_the_game:
Minesweeper: Computer Dungeon

This is a single-player meat Roguelike strategy game. In the game we play as Leo as he explores a dungeon full of monsters, items, rewards and story, armed by learning a series of functional functions that you can combine to achieve unexpected results. Players decode unknown areas by clicking the left mouse button, and we may discover enemies, rewards, items, and some plot.

How to play

Meat pigeon minesweeper, use the left mouse button to decode the unknown area, it may be a reward, it may also be an enemy, the number in the lower left corner is the number of enemies around, pay attention!! We move with the right mouse button, and after decoding the unknown area, we move to trigger something in the unknown area. In this game, players can use their talents to add points and match the skills they choose in the game to achieve unexpected results

Lots of interesting items

Players can choose their own talents Every time you enter the next map, the malware will always become more and more difficult to deal with, and players can combine their skills with their own wits and level characteristics to achieve the best results.

Different maps, different ways to play

The game contains different maps, and different maps will have a lot of unexpected gameplay, different plots, and new monsters.

Combat style with a strategy theme

Players can use their wits and combine different talents and skills to achieve the best combat results

This is a single-player meat Roguelike strategy game. In the game we play as Leo as he explores a dungeon full of monsters, items, rewards and story, armed by learning a series of functional functions that you can combine to achieve unexpected results. Players decode unknown areas by clicking the left mouse button, and we may discover enemies, rewards, items, and some plot.

Meat pigeon minesweeper, use the left mouse button to decode the unknown area, it may be a reward, it may also be an enemy, the number in the lower left corner is the number of enemies around, pay attention!! We move with the right mouse button, and after decoding the unknown area, we move to trigger something in the unknown area. name: Computer dungeon

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0+ (2.1 with ARB extensions acceptable)
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 需要 64 位处理器和操作系统

short_description: This game follows a conscious program that explores and develops in the online world from the very beginning. In the game, we play as Leo, exploring a variety of hardware drivers and system software, where there are tons of enemies, rewards, special items and an interesting plot
supported_languages: Simplified Chinese, English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Japanese, Swedish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Spanish - Latin America, Korean
